_sText:
Welcome to "pompeparty_LL_01"

Map created By El_Mexicano


This is an SHOTGUN map(traduce pompeparty by "SHOTGUNPARTY")your only weapon will be the normal shotgun , the knife & 1 HE , with 32 slots in each team for a total of 64 slots 

Very fun and speed map , there is many like "sky jump" will make you move faster and higher and will permit you to access many plateform and 
part of the map faster.In that version of the map , there is water on the floor which make you amortize the fall after a jump like that you don't loose HP
There is too a yellow central plateforme(you can see on the screen) sliding & see trought but the bullet don't go trhought ^^
Ambiant musique and originals sounds in that map too .

The .BSP file makes 2,5 MO.

Big thanks to the Los Latinos production for their help & all the Los latinos team for the help they gave me 

=> Latinos internet page  :  http://www.loslatinos.fr
=> Los Latinos server  :  91.121.169.49:27015   FUN FUN FUN


Thanks: Me and my team


INSTAllation : only extract the .RAR into you folder CSTRIKE  .......


El_mexicano
(ps: if you encounter any problems with the map , please contact us at 
     http://www.loslatinos.fr, thank you ).



Download the map cutparty_LL_01 too which is almost the same map , but only with the Knife weapon and without the water on the floor
Which make the jump really harder when you fall ^^
